TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Ribbon extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector

summary.span: 表示承载快速访问工具栏、应用程序菜单和选项卡的功能区用户界面的根元素。

span.span: Represents the root element of a ribbon user interface that hosts a Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区是一种命令栏，它将应用程序的功能组织到应用程序窗口顶部的一系列选项卡中。A ribbon is a command bar that organizes the features of an application into a series of tabs at the top of the application window. 它将替换传统的菜单栏和工具栏。It replaces both the traditional menu bar and toolbars. 类是功能区用户界面 (UI) 的根元素 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中。The class is the root element of a ribbon user interface (UI) in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). 类承载 、 和一个或多个 控件。The class hosts a , a , and one or more controls. 然后，这些控件托管各种按钮和菜单控件，这些控件可实现对应用程序命令的访问。These controls then host a variety of button and menu controls that enable access to application commands. 以下列表显示了功能区元素的典型层次结构。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of ribbon elements. - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - - - - - - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个简单的功能区，该功能区由 Visual Studio 2010 模板创建，其中包含 "帮助" 窗格和 "快速访问工具栏" 元素。The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbondefault)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性将对象与相关联 。You use the property to associate a object with the . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示附加到功能区控件的简单应用程序菜单。The following example shows a simple Application Menu attached to a ribbon control. 有关更多示例，请参见。For more examples, see . ```xaml xmlns:ribbon="clr-namespace:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon;assembly=RibbonControlsLibrary" ...                                                    ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 *"上下文" 选项卡* 可以显示仅在特定上下文中相关的命令组。You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context. 上下文选项卡组根据指定的条件显示或隐藏。Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria. 例如，检测到 tablet 输入时可能会显示 "墨迹工具" 选项卡组，或者在选择图像对象时可能会显示 "图片工具" 选项卡组。For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了 "**墨迹工具**" 上下文选项卡组中的命名**笔**。The following example shows a named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group. ```xaml                              ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置 "帮助" 窗格的内容，使用户能够访问应用程序的帮助内容。You can set the contents of the help pane to enable users to access help content for your application. 通常会将属性设置 为启动单独的 "帮助" 窗口的单个按钮。You will typically set the property to a single button that launches a separate help window. 不过，您可以在 "帮助" 窗格中定义要执行的任何内容。However, you can define any content to go in the help pane. 可以通过设置属性来指定内容的布局和外观 。You can specify the layout and appearance of the content by setting the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调整应用程序窗口的大小时，功能区会自动折叠，并且没有足够的空间来以有意义的方式显示功能区。The ribbon collapses automatically when the application window is resized and does not have enough space to display the ribbon in a meaningful way. 当功能区处于折叠状态时，所有功能区元素都将隐藏在视图中。When the ribbon is collapsed, all ribbon elements are hidden from view. 当功能区处于折叠状态时，将 发生事件。When the ribbon is collapsed, the event occurs. 展开功能区后，将 发生事件。When the ribbon is expanded, the event occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `true` ，将显示快速访问工具栏、应用程序菜单和选项卡标题，但选项卡内容会置于下拉栏中，并且默认情况下不会显示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 当用户选择选项卡标题时，会打开该选项卡的下拉箭头并显示其内容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 选择或取消选择选项卡标题将在 和之间切换属性 `true` `false` 。Selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则 属性也为 `false` 。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过右键单击功能区，然后从上下文菜单中选择 **"最小化功能区"** 来最小化功能区。A user can minimize the ribbon by right-clicking the ribbon and selecting **Minimize the Ribbon** from the context menu. 当 属性为时 `true` ，将显示快速访问工具栏、应用程序菜单和选项卡标题，但选项卡内容会置于下拉栏中，并且默认情况下不会显示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 当用户选择选项卡标题时，会打开该选项卡的下拉箭头并显示其内容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 如果 属性为 `true` ，则选择或取消选择选项卡标题将在 和之间切换属性 `true` `false` 。If the property is `true`, selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则 属性也为 `false` 。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
